name: Blockade Runner
desc: Increases ship maneuverability by %s percent and allows the ship to benefit from the zero flux speed bonus at up to %s percent of the ship's maximum flux capacity.
short: Increased handling and increased zero flux bonus levels

name: Maintenance Bots
desc: Increases engine and weapon repair speed by %s percent and decreases the amount of time the ship remains disabled by %s percent.
short: Reduced overload time and increased repair speed

name: Point Defence Matrix
desc:
Gives all Small AND Medium non-missile weapons the ability to automatically target incoming enemy missiles.

Incompatible with Integrated Point Defense AI!
short: All small and medium non-missile weapons act as point-defense.

name: FDS Combat Systems
desc:
All ships of the Fringe Defence Syndicate are equipped with experimental enhanced combat systems, allowing the ship's weapons to turn at a %s percent higher rate, recover from the effects of recoil %s percent faster while also making energy weapons fire %s percent farther.

Furthermore, fighting alongside allied ships causes less stress to the system, decreasing the rate at which Combat Readiness decreases by %s percent, up to a maximum of %s percent, with allied Syndicate ships providing twice the boost of the ships from other factions.

Incompatible with Advanced Turret Gyros!

name: Augmented Sensor Arrays
desc: Increases sensor range by %s percent, both in the campaign map and in combat. Its range can be further increased with the aid of a Terror-class Dreadnought.
short: Increases sensor range by %s percent, both in the campaign map and in combat.

name: HULLMOD CONFLICT
desc: %s, the hullmod you tried to install conflicts with this hull or another previously installed hullmod.
